mapper.select: select focusUserId, count(1) statisticCount from focus where DATE_FORMAT(focusTime, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{statisticDate} group by focusUserId
select videoUserId as userId, count(1) statisticCount from videoComment where DATE_FORMAT(postTime, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{statisticDate} group by videoUserId

select videoUserId as userId, actionType as dataType, sum(count) as statisticCount from action where DATE_FORMAT(actionTime, '%Y-%m-%d')=#{statisticDate} and actionType in (#{item}) group by videoUserId, actionType

select cast(ifnull(sum(playCount), 0) as SIGNED) as playCount, cast(ifnull(sum(likeCount), 0) as SIGNED) as likeCount, cast(ifnull(sum(danmuCount), 0) as SIGNED) as danmuCount, cast(ifnull(sum(commentCount), 0) as SIGNED) as commentCount, cast(ifnull(sum(coinCount), 0) as SIGNED) as coinCount, cast(ifnull(sum(collectCount), 0) as SIGNED) as collectCount from video
userId = #{userId}
select ifnull(sum(count), 0) as count, statisticDate, dataType from statisticInfo where statisticDate = #{query.statisticDate} group by dataType, statisticDate
select count(1) as count, DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') as statisticDate from user group by statisticDate order by statisticDate desc
